<ce:section-title id="sect0040">Synthesis of {[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>(L)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>(OH)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·3NMP}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (1)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">A mixture of Zn(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (29.7 mg, 0.1 mmol), and H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L (14.5 mg, 0.05 mmol) in NMP (4 mL) and distilled water (2 mL) were sealed a Parr Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25 mL) and heated at 150 °C for 72 h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10 °C h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were gained by filtration and washed with NMP. Yield: 27.6 mg, 44.52% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C<ce:inf loc="post">41</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">51</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>: C, 39.69; H, 4.11; N, 7.91. Found: C, 39.45; H, 4.13; N, 7.85. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3380(m), 3106(w), 3000(w), 2925(w), 1517(s), 1448(s), 1377(s), 1245(m), 1103(m), 1063(s), 879(m), 773(s), 734(s), 584(m).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="sect0045">Synthesis of {[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(L)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]·Diox}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (2)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0045" view="all">The synthesis procedure used was similar to that of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>, except that NMP was used replaced by Diox in the synthetic procedure. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> were obtained. Yield: 30.0 mg, 66.67% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C<ce:inf loc="post">30</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">26</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>: C, 40.23; H, 2.91; N, 1.56. Found: C, 40.42; H, 2.88; N, 1.62. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3407(m), 3114(w), 1868(w), 1509(s), 1442(s), 1369(s), 1311(w), 1112(s), 1072(m), 777(m), 597(s).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="sect0050">Synthesis of {[Cd<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(L)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>]·NMP·3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (3)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0050" view="all">A mixture of Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (30.8 mg, 0.1 mmol), and H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L (14.5 mg, 0.05 mmol) in NMP (2 mL) and distilled water (2 mL) were placed into a glass vial (10 mL) and heated at 105 °C for 72 h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10 °C h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> were collected by filtration and washed with NMP. Yield: 30.2 mg, 52.06% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C<ce:inf loc="post">31</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">39</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>Cd<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>: C, 32.21; H, 3.38; N, 6.06. Found: C, 32.13; H, 3.34; N, 6.24. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3594(w), 3345(w), 3114(m), 2937(w), 2875(w), 1841(w), 1511(s), 1446(m), 1396(w), 1365(s), 1303(m), 1243(w), 1176(w), 1112(w), 1066(s), 784(s), 728(s), 663(w), 572(w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="sect0055">Synthesis of {[Pb<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(L)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(NMP)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)]·H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf> (4)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0055" view="all">A mixture of Pb(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (33.1 mg, 0.1 mmol), and H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>L (14.5 mg, 0.05 mmol) in NMP (4 mL) and distilled water (2 mL) were sealed in a Parr Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25 mL) and heated at 130 °C for 72 h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10 °C h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>. Colorless crystals of <ce:bold>4</ce:bold> were collected by filtration and washed with H<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>O. Yield: 30.1 mg, 42.15% (based on H<ce:inf loc="post">
<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>
</ce:inf>L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C<ce:inf loc="post">36</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">36</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>Pb<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>: C, 30.20; H, 2.52; N, 5.87. Found: C, 30.32; H, 2.63; N, 5.74. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3390(m), 3118(m), 2979(w), 2940(w), 2875(w), 1874 (w), 1508(m), 1448(w), 1398(w), 1340(m), 1295(s), 1348(s), 1236(w), 1105(m), 1058(m), 773(s), 727(s), 692(m), 622(w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of {[Zn4(L)2(H2O)4(OH)2]⋅3NMP}n (1)

A mixture of Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (29.7mg, 0.1mmol), and H3L (14.5mg, 0.05mmol) in NMP (4mL) and distilled water (2mL) were sealed a Parr Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25mL) and heated at 150°C for 72h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10°Ch-1. Colorless crystals of 1 were gained by filtration and washed with NMP. Yield: 27.6mg, 44.52% (based on H3L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C41H51N7O21Zn4: C, 39.69; H, 4.11; N, 7.91. Found: C, 39.45; H, 4.13; N, 7.85. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3380(m), 3106(w), 3000(w), 2925(w), 1517(s), 1448(s), 1377(s), 1245(m), 1103(m), 1063(s), 879(m), 773(s), 734(s), 584(m).

Synthesis of {[Zn3(L)2(H2O)2]⋅Diox}n (2)

The synthesis procedure used was similar to that of 1, except that NMP was used replaced by Diox in the synthetic procedure. Colorless crystals of 2 were obtained. Yield: 30.0mg, 66.67% (based on H3L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C30H26N4O16Zn3: C, 40.23; H, 2.91; N, 1.56. Found: C, 40.42; H, 2.88; N, 1.62. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3407(m), 3114(w), 1868(w), 1509(s), 1442(s), 1369(s), 1311(w), 1112(s), 1072(m), 777(m), 597(s).

Synthesis of {[Cd3(L)2(H2O)5]⋅NMP⋅3H2O}n (3)

A mixture of Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (30.8mg, 0.1mmol), and H3L (14.5mg, 0.05mmol) in NMP (2mL) and distilled water (2mL) were placed into a glass vial (10mL) and heated at 105°C for 72h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10°Ch-1. Colorless crystals of 3 were collected by filtration and washed with NMP. Yield: 30.2mg, 52.06% (based on H3L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C31H39N5O21Cd3: C, 32.21; H, 3.38; N, 6.06. Found: C, 32.13; H, 3.34; N, 6.24. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3594(w), 3345(w), 3114(m), 2937(w), 2875(w), 1841(w), 1511(s), 1446(m), 1396(w), 1365(s), 1303(m), 1243(w), 1176(w), 1112(w), 1066(s), 784(s), 728(s), 663(w), 572(w).

Synthesis of {[Pb3(L)2(NMP)2(H2O)]⋅H2O}n (4)

A mixture of Pb(NO3)2 (33.1mg, 0.1mmol), and H3L (14.5mg, 0.05mmol) in NMP (4mL) and distilled water (2mL) were sealed in a Parr Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25mL) and heated at 130°C for 72h, and gradually cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10°Ch-1. Colorless crystals of 4 were collected by filtration and washed with H 2 O. Yield: 30.1mg, 42.15% (based on H 3 L ligand). Anal. calcd (%) for C36H36N6O16Pb3: C, 30.20; H, 2.52; N, 5.87. Found: C, 30.32; H, 2.63; N, 5.74. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3390(m), 3118(m), 2979(w), 2940(w), 2875(w), 1874 (w), 1508(m), 1448(w), 1398(w), 1340(m), 1295(s), 1348(s), 1236(w), 1105(m), 1058(m), 773(s), 727(s), 692(m), 622(w).
